channel.title: Ramblings on Wind's Howling
channel.description: Recent content in Ramblings on Wind's Howling

item.title: Le roi est mort, vive le roi!
item.author: lingkangwei.kevin@gmail.com (Kevin Ling)
item.description: The king is dead, long live the king! I have always wanted to write something. Yet my mind drifts like the snow. It is so hard for people like me to settle down. But this is the time. Iâ€™m not a writer, but I want to write. For so many times, words and sentences were making such noises, fighting to get out. Then I started to get all the equipments prepared (a notebook, a pen, or just my laptop).
